text: Soni (mwakumbusyani) lisiku lyatachasonganganya wanaose (nikwasalila yanti): “E jenumanja likuga lya achimajini! Chisimu mwatupiye achinawandu (wakwasochelesya).” Sano achimijao (majinio) mwa achinawandu chachiti: “Ambuje wetu! Twapatisyanaga ukoto sikati jetu, ni twaajiyiche ndema jetu ajila jamwatuwichile (jakuwila).” (Allah) tachiti: “Moto ni liwuto lyenu lyakutamilichika, chim'be wandamo mwalakwemo ikaweje mwachasachile Allah (kuti wandu wasambi nambo waliji ni chikulupi cha Tauhidi akopoche), chisimu Ambuje wenu ni Walunda lwakusokoka, Wakumanyilila nnope.”
